General.Name: Kingsignal Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Kingsignal Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and markets voice signal cables, connectors, components, and accessories in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers RF cables, including semi-rigid and flexible, military standard RG series, corrugated coaxial, KSR and FLL low loss, micro coaxial, MS2 low loss, tri-coaxial, CATV coaxial, test, multiple core coaxial, and stable cables, as well as commercial wires; and RF connectors. The company also provides circular electrical connectors, micro rectangular electrical connectors, and power cables; optical transceivers, assemblies, cables, and passive connectors; LAN cables and jumpers, and multipair cables; circuit boards; and chip modules. In addition, it offers Wi-Fi mesh, wireless Bluetooth headset, and docking station. Its products are used in the communication, rail transit, new energy, industrial automation, and medical wiring harness industries. Further, it engages in agriculture; manufacture of optical communication, computer, communications, and other electronic equipment, auto parts and accessories, electronic materials, integrated circuits, optoelectronic devices, mechanical and electrical equipment, and electromechanical and electronic components, wires, and cables; wholesale trade; production, import, retail, and export of medical masks; import and export of technology; sale of new energy vehicle electrical accessories, power electronic components, and electricity; leasing of non-residential real estate and housing; production and sale of labor protection products; and manufacture and sale of. Additionally, it provides technology promotion and application; telecommunications, broadcast television, and satellite transmission; software and information technology; and technical development, consultation, exchanges, and transfer services. Kingsignal Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
